text: avarkalitam vakkuruti vankuvatarkakat ‘tur' (sinay) ennum malaiyai avarkal mitu uyarttiya camayattil ‘‘(innakarattin) vayilil talaikunintu vanankiyavarkalakave cellunkal'' enru nam avarkalukku kurinom. (Min vettaiyata) canikkilamaiyil ninkal varampu miratirkal enrum avarkalukkuk kuri (ivarrirkakavum) urutiyana vakkurutiyai nam avarkalitam perriruntom. (Eninum avarkal marivittanar)
